resources.string: Copyright (C) 2011-2012 by Daniel Kraft. Feel free to send me any comments or suggestions via email or visit Angulo\'s webpage.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but without any warranty; without even the implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
To measure an angle (slope or inclination), simply point the device into one direction, press Set Reference, and point it into the other direction.
Then the rotation angle relative to gravity (down) and magnetic field (towards magnetic pole) is displayed. The green number is a combined, usually more accurate angle.
For easy reading, you can also Freeze (and later Unfreeze).
See also the webpage for more details.
